type.description: This field describes the view to associate this category with. Valid options are brandFamily, regulars, suggestedItems, gifts, groupedByCountry, packaging, alphabetical, productOrdering, flavor

sortOrder.description: The order in which this category should appear relative to others. Categories are sorted from lowest sortOrder to highest.

iconImageURL.description: The primary image associated with this category.

backgroundImageURL.description: The background image associated with this category.

brands.description: The brands associated with this category. Note that categories are always associated with a list of brands or a list of items, never both.

items.description: The items associated with this category. Note that categories are always associated with a list of brands or a list of items, never both.
